parameters.functionCode: const items=$input.all();for(const i of items){const e=i.json.emotion||'neutral';const st=e==='excited'?0.3:e==='serious'?0.8:0.5;i.json.voice_config={text:i.json.script.replace(/。/g,'。[breath]'),stability:st,clarity:0.75+Math.random()*0.15,style_exaggeration:e==='excited'?0.8:0.5,bio_noise:true};i.json.binary_noise=Buffer.from(Math.random().toString()).toString('base64').substr(0,16);}return items;

nodes.name: バイオモジュレーション
